data.name: Speed Mazing Demo
data.detailed_description:
Speed Mazing will have you and your friends run carelessly through a maze full of deadly spikes!

Ideal party game!

For up to 4 players at a time. Speed Mazing is amazingly accessible for all players. Rules are easy to pick up and controls are very simple. The matches will keep you on your toes, though. Get ready for some seriously exciting battles! Per-player handicap settings allow you to balance players with different skill levels.

Perfect game to play with your kids!

Speed Mazing lets you easily cheat your kids into thinking they are better players than you! Falling off the ledge is a common thing here, so your kids won't even notice you're doing it on purpose to let them win. Tested to work with kids up to 8 years old. It makes for a wonderful parent-child time <3

Challenging and addictive speed runs for single player!

If you prefer to play the game by yourself, there's a handful of Time Attack courses. With forking routes, difficult corners and bonuses spawned all around, it's up to you to choose the optimal path, and then perfectly execute your run.

Game Features

  • Hundreds of interesting and competitive maps divided into 5 diverse environments.
  • Beautiful graphics, catchy music and impactful effects.
  • Thrilling battles for 2 - 4 players on a shared screen.
  • Up to 3 people can play semi-comfortably using single keyboard.
  • Challenging Time Attack mode for single player with specially crafted courses.

data.short_description: Exciting "racing" party game for up to 4 players. Quick gameplay loop, hundreds of maps and eye-catching visuals. Also included is a challenging time attack mode for single player.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD 620, AMD Radeon RX Vega 10 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes. And some speakers too!
  • Additional Notes: Intended for low quality settings and 720p resolution. Gamepads strongly recommended. Keyboard allows for a maximum of 3 players.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX Vega 8, Nvidia GeForce MX150 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Definitely. With at least two good speakers, because we have STEREO sound here!
  • Additional Notes: Intended for highest quality settings and 1080p resolution. Gamepads strongly recommended. Keyboard allows for a maximum of 3 players.
